title: This actual makes no sense Riot at all
body:
You're honestly telling me that I get perma'd for saying this. I even reported the Garen in my game 2 that ruined the experience for me and even had a chat with Riot Gunny about this crap. Not one toxic comment the entire game and I'm permabanned straight from a 25 game chat restriction.

(08:21:00 PM) MileyStayTwerkin: Garen was supposed to go jungle and instead took my cs and int'd at top lane rendering me unable to play my role or do anything vs my opponent. Instead of him leaving and remaking, he decided to ruin the game for all of us 
(08:22:32 PM) Player Support Bot: Hey! We’re getting a ton of new chats right now. It may take upwards of 30 minutes to get to your chat, but if you sit tight we’ll help you out as soon as we can. If you’re not about that waiting in line lifestyle, you can always submit a ticket instead! 
(08:23:31 PM) *** Gunny joined the chat *** 
(08:23:40 PM) Gunny: Hey there! Finished with your game? 
(08:23:48 PM) MileyStayTwerkin: Yup 15 min surrender 
(08:24:21 PM) Gunny: Alright, thanks for submitting this report. As a note I can't give you any details considering our investigation due to our privacy policy, or if this player is penalized. 
(08:24:36 PM) Gunny: But, if you have any questions, I'd be happy to answer them to the best of my ability :) 
(08:24:40 PM) MileyStayTwerkin: ? 
(08:24:51 PM) MileyStayTwerkin: so am I just supposed to lose everytime this happens 
(08:24:53 PM) MileyStayTwerkin: ? 
(08:27:38 PM) Gunny: Well no, that's not at all what I want for you. In these cases, playing to the best of your ability is what you can do in the moment, and sometimes that can end up in a win. 
(08:27:49 PM) MileyStayTwerkin: we have no smite 
(08:27:50 PM) Gunny: It's our goal with the penalties we give for players to realize that this sort of thing isn't okay. 
(08:28:04 PM) Gunny: So that it stops happening. 
(08:28:08 PM) MileyStayTwerkin: we lose every dragon 
(08:28:10 PM) MileyStayTwerkin: baron 
(08:28:12 PM) MileyStayTwerkin: no ganks 
(08:28:32 PM) Gunny: I can't really change what has already happened, but we can work together to help prevent it in the future. I definitely know the feeling though. 
(08:28:33 PM) Gunny: It's rough. 
(08:28:38 PM) MileyStayTwerkin: i know hes not going to get banned for this 
(08:28:43 PM) MileyStayTwerkin: so frustating 
(08:28:48 PM) MileyStayTwerkin: when its happening to you 
(08:28:59 PM) MileyStayTwerkin: just wasted 15 minutes of my life 
(08:29:07 PM) MileyStayTwerkin: not even able to play because of a troll 
(08:29:19 PM) MileyStayTwerkin: but if i call him one bad name in chat i get 2 weeked 
(08:30:07 PM) Gunny: I mean...yeah, you can't call anyone bad names or slurs, regardless of what they're doing. 
(08:30:27 PM) MileyStayTwerkin: why is that an instant ban though 
(08:30:41 PM) MileyStayTwerkin: whereas someone directly ruining the game isnt 
(08:31:15 PM) Gunny: Because it's something that we don't tolerate, and actually, a confirmed case of intentional feeding or griefing IS an instant two week. 
(08:31:27 PM) Gunny: We just can't tell you when we give them to other players due to our privacy policy. 
(08:31:56 PM) MileyStayTwerkin: whatever but thanks anyway



Game 1
In-Game
MileyStayTwerkin: counterjungle
MileyStayTwerkin: ez
MileyStayTwerkin: ive done no wrong
MileyStayTwerkin: i am supporting
MileyStayTwerkin: who are you to tell me how to support?
MileyStayTwerkin: this is how i supprot
MileyStayTwerkin: 17
MileyStayTwerkin: thx for exp
MileyStayTwerkin: lvl 8
MileyStayTwerkin: you guys are blind to the fact that we can win
MileyStayTwerkin: youre banned
MileyStayTwerkin: shen ult
MileyStayTwerkin: we still gonna win
MileyStayTwerkin: we are scalers
MileyStayTwerkin: vlad fed\
MileyStayTwerkin: 0/3
MileyStayTwerkin: 0/3
MileyStayTwerkin: honestly if mid and top didnt feed
MileyStayTwerkin: this would be easy
MileyStayTwerkin: 2/7 rengar
MileyStayTwerkin: and youre worried about me
MileyStayTwerkin: you still wouldve fed talon
MileyStayTwerkin: typical bronze
MileyStayTwerkin: always blame a teammate
MileyStayTwerkin: before the game even started
MileyStayTwerkin: you guys called me troll
MileyStayTwerkin: how is that possible?
MileyStayTwerkin: hes been like this all game
MileyStayTwerkin: even called me the f word so thats a 2 week
MileyStayTwerkin: do it then
MileyStayTwerkin: say it bud
MileyStayTwerkin: trundle?
MileyStayTwerkin: say it
MileyStayTwerkin: thats what i thought
MileyStayTwerkin: hm thats odd
MileyStayTwerkin: its awful quiet now that we're on the inhib tower
MileyStayTwerkin: 3/8
MileyStayTwerkin: i tried to tell you guys
MileyStayTwerkin: you guys dont have scalers
MileyStayTwerkin: and youre losing
MileyStayTwerkin: im actually gold 1
MileyStayTwerkin: b8d
MileyStayTwerkin: somebody sounds upset
MileyStayTwerkin: cmon now
MileyStayTwerkin: IM SCALING
MileyStayTwerkin: his team was coming
MileyStayTwerkin: sure
MileyStayTwerkin: it was go in or die
MileyStayTwerkin: scaler
MileyStayTwerkin: salt
Post-Game
MileyStayTwerkin: 5 seconds
MileyStayTwerkin: xD
MileyStayTwerkin: a true scaler
MileyStayTwerkin: most gold
MileyStayTwerkin: and they wanna report me
MileyStayTwerkin: lol
MileyStayTwerkin: love this game
MileyStayTwerkin: you are getting banned
Game 2
In-Game
MileyStayTwerkin: if you come top im afk
MileyStayTwerkin: cya guys
MileyStayTwerkin: sick of playing with people like this
MileyStayTwerkin: i will be making a ticket
MileyStayTwerkin: im making a ticket
MileyStayTwerkin: yes
MileyStayTwerkin: its an L
MileyStayTwerkin: we have no dragons
MileyStayTwerkin: afk
MileyStayTwerkin: taking cs
MileyStayTwerkin: sorry about me?
MileyStayTwerkin: sorry about garen that didnt take smite and took cs at top instead
MileyStayTwerkin: im not playing with an idiot who loses the game on purpose and doesnt have the curtesy to disconnect so we can remake
MileyStayTwerkin: ive already submitted a ticket about garen
MileyStayTwerkin: and now he wont surrender
Post-Game
MileyStayTwerkin: report him

replies.body:
> not one toxic comment

Not really, aside from almost everything you said.
What here is actually toxic that verifies as hate speech or verbal abuse?
You're cherry picking definitions to suit - toxic speech also constitutes of harassment or consistent negative chat, and is assessed without context.

Seriously only game that does this shit. Half of what you are saying doesn't make any sense. Fucking riot just uses a bot to decide this shit. Only company that has this problem. And thats why everyone is leaving this shithole

Literally nothing you said here is true.

People aren't leaving, riot isn't the only company that does this, and they use machine learning not a plug and chug "bot".

> [{quoted}](name=MileyStayTwerkin,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=49gcWGeV,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-06-26T04:55:00.155+0000)
>
> What here is actually toxic that verifies as hate speech or verbal abuse?

Things other than hate speech are toxic.

More or less all of it is abuse.

* Flaming endlessly.

* Threatening reports/bans.

* Rank shaming - from a lv18, good shit

* KDA shaming

* Threatening to quit

You basically checked every box on how to be worthless demoralizing garbage for your team _except_ hate speech.
Sure whatever, you werent in the games so you have no idea the connotation of what I was saying. Constantly being harrassed and being called %%%%% and %%%%%% and all types of shit.

> [{quoted}](name=MileyStayTwerkin,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=49gcWGeV,comment-id=0001000000010000,timestamp=2018-06-27T17:05:14.255+0000)
>
> Sure whatever, you werent in the games so you have no idea the connotation of what I was saying. Constantly being harrassed and being called %%%%% and %%%%%% and all types of shit.

Actually, it does not matter at all.

You had the choice to be better than them. You chose to lower yourself to their level, and all of you probably got punished equally.

Dont be trash unless you want to get treated like trash.
Yeah sure buddy you stay pussy okay. Trash ass game shouldnt even have chat if you get banned for talking. What the fuck is the point of talking to the enemy if it isnt for teasing fun

> [{quoted}](name=MileyStayTwerkin,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=49gcWGeV,comment-id=000100000001000000000000,timestamp=2018-06-27T20:54:19.664+0000)
>
> Yeah sure buddy you stay pussy okay. Trash ass game shouldnt even have chat if you get banned for talking. What the fuck is the point of talking to the enemy if it isnt for teasing fun

Pathetic schoolyard flaming, going by your example. Another option is intelligent conversation.

You did not get punished for talking, you got punished for running your mouth like a 15-year-old who cant control their ego-erection yet.

Also hilarious how you randomly accuse people of being liberals, like it is some sort of insult. Being intelligent and not tolerating trash does not require being liberal, although i understand it is a handy excuse for cultist and incel rejects - must be politics, not just people disliking you for your attitude and behavior.
Definitely can tell you are a liberal
I'm seeing mostly negative chat in your logs. What doesn't make sense? That you were permanently banned after a 25 game chat restriction?
Including the fact that I had a Garen int and lose the game for us as well as a team that was flaming me from the jump nothing here is toxic
Nothing here is justified by a permanent ban

Game 1: This probably weighed heavily on what your punishment was. Here, you're clearly encouraging someone else to say something that would get you banned for at least 2 weeks.

>MileyStayTwerkin: hes been like this all game
MileyStayTwerkin: even called me the f word so thats a 2 week
MileyStayTwerkin: do it then
MileyStayTwerkin: say it bud
MileyStayTwerkin: trundle?
MileyStayTwerkin: say it
MileyStayTwerkin: thats what i thought

This is pointing out teammate's negative scores. It's not helpful, and it appears moreso to affect your teammates' morale negatively.
>MileyStayTwerkin: vlad fed\
MileyStayTwerkin: 0/3
MileyStayTwerkin: 0/3
MileyStayTwerkin: honestly if mid and top didnt feed
MileyStayTwerkin: this would be easy
MileyStayTwerkin: 2/7 rengar
MileyStayTwerkin: and youre worried about me
MileyStayTwerkin: you still wouldve fed talon

Negative chat intending to insult.
>MileyStayTwerkin: typical bronze
MileyStayTwerkin: always blame a teammate
MileyStayTwerkin: before the game even started
MileyStayTwerkin: you guys called me troll
MileyStayTwerkin: how is that possible?

I'm not sure what you're going for with game 2. When I looked at your match history, I thought this was a remake since you were level 1. It isn't. 

All your chat in game 2 is argumentative. You were afk. You even made a support ticket during the game, as if you wanted support to know about your behavior in game.

Afk because of an idiot that took my lane.

And you cant even comment on why I said something without looking at the entire game chat and not just mine
You're responsible for your own chat, as are other players for theirs. Sorry, "but they said..." isn't an acceptable excuse for what you type in chat.
Literally the only game where I've seen people banned from literally using the chat. If you say anything other than gg or gl you will be banned
That's not true, I always use chat to make calls and stuff. Not banned yet.

Strange that you get punished for activly breaking the simple rules you agreed upon...
What's next? People getting arrested for murder?
Nobody starting getting banned for saying anything until around Septtember of 2017, then riot started getting on this casual kiddy shit.

But you see all those days where you didn't commit murder should count in your favour!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
